trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANARK123_04573_SEQ_00<tab>Maru awaits you with an appraising look.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANARK123_04573_TODO_00<tab>Obtain clumps of sticky moss at the Font of Maya.
TEXT_BANARK123_04573_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the baskets of sticky moss to Maru.

TEXT_BANARK123_04573_MARU_000_000<tab>I've been lookin' for you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I'm in need of a strong swimmer, and you look like you could keep up with a hippo in the water.
TEXT_BANARK123_04573_MARU_000_001<tab>A friend of mine just came back from Yedlihmad, bearin' a request from Kancana herself...

TEXT_BANARK123_04573_MARU_000_002<tab>The Font of Maya is in sore need of a deep cleanin', and we─which means <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>─gotta help. Kancana wants the moss gatherin' along the stone walls cleared away.

TEXT_BANARK123_04573_MARU_000_003<tab>An' as you know, I don't like to see anythin' go to waste, so I'm thinkin' I might find a use for the moss. Take these baskets with you and bring back whatever you find growin' under the water's surface.
TEXT_BANARK123_04573_MARU_000_010<tab>You're lookin' as dry as a hippo bakin' under the sun. Did you manage to gather the moss?

TEXT_BANARK123_04573_MARU_000_011<tab>Ah, good─I was worried you'd take one look at them waters and think better of your choices. I'll let Kancana know that the temple should be lookin' a bit more pristine.
TEXT_BANARK123_04573_MARU_000_012<tab>As luck would have it, hippos go mad for this moss. An' it don't hurt that it provides them with all the nutrients a growin' 'pot needs! Well, how about a bite?

TEXT_BANARK123_04573_MARU_000_013<tab>Hahaha! I'm just kiddin'. I know you've got much more refined tastes─maybe you can indulge 'em with this bit of coin? I even know a service that offers fast, fresh grub, delivered right to you...
